title: Quant MF gets RBI nod to hike stake in RBL Bank
description: As of May 10, Quant MF through its various schemes owned 4.68 per cent equity share capital in the private sector lender.Quant MF gets RBI nod to hike stake in RBL Bank
content: The Reserve Bank has allowed Quant Mutual Fund to hike its stake in RBL Bank to 9.98 per cent, according to a regulatory filing. As of May 10, Quant MF through its various schemes owned 4.68 per cent equity share capital in the private sector lender. "RBI...has accorded its approval to quant Money Managers Ltd to acquire "aggregate holding" of up to 9.98 per cent of the paid-up share capital or voting rights in RBL Bank through various schemes of Quant Mutual Fund," the filing said. The shareholding has to be increased by May 12, 2025, it said. RBL Bank stock was trading at Rs 246.60, up 0.20 per cent on BSE.
